医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究为更有效的非成瘾性慢性疼痛治疗铺平了道路瑞典卡罗林斯卡学院的研究人员开发了一种新的全面的遗传活动图谱，用于了解慢性疼痛的原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Study-paves-way-to-more-efficient-non-addictive-treatment-for-chronic-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Study-paves-way-to-more-efficient-non-addictive-treatment-for-chronic-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5daf49f1-a79a-453d-a7bf-b1532fea1182 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 08:24:00 -0400 Study paves way to more efficient non-addictive treatment for chronic pain
在疫苗怀疑论上，特朗普领先，他的政党紧随其后四年前，前总统唐纳德·特朗普政府加速了 covid-19 疫苗的开发和推广。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Trump-leads-and-his-party-follows-on-vaccine-skepticism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Trump-leads-and-his-party-follows-on-vaccine-skepticism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7f6e041-f8de-42b8-a0d9-5ce443df5057 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 08:18:00 -0400 Trump leads, and his party follows, on vaccine skepticism
研究揭示戒烟对全球预期寿命的影响根据全球疾病、伤害和风险因素负担 (GBD) 的一项研究，到 2050 年，通过将各地吸烟率从目前水平降低至 5%，加速全球吸烟率的下降，可以延长预期寿命并防止数百万人过早死亡。 ) 烟草预测合作者发表在《柳叶刀公共卫生》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Study-reveals-impact-of-smoking-elimination-on-global-life-expectancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Study-reveals-impact-of-smoking-elimination-on-global-life-expectancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1094cc2-03a1-43de-8381-a35e810b987d Fri, 04 Oct 2024 08:16:00 -0400
这就是为什么在怀孕期间注射新冠疫苗很重要根据美国疾病控制与预防中心发布的新数据，近 90% 因感染 covid-19 而需要住院治疗的婴儿的母亲在怀孕期间没有接种疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Heree28099s-why-getting-a-covid-shot-during-pregnancy-is-important.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Heree28099s-why-getting-a-covid-shot-during-pregnancy-is-important.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72808f9c-d1d8-4ca5-9dc2-833793039767 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 08:04:46 -0400 Here’s why getting a covid shot during pregnancy is important
研究将艺术和文化参与与改善年轻人的福祉联系起来过去二十年里，英国年轻人的福祉显着下降，一项重大国际研究将英国年轻人的生活满意度在 74 个国家中排名倒数第四。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Research-links-arts-and-culture-participation-to-improved-wellbeing-in-young-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Research-links-arts-and-culture-participation-to-improved-wellbeing-in-young-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f13f858-726f-4064-984f-3919b25da231 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 07:38:00 -0400 Research links arts and culture participation to improved wellbeing in young people
Owkin 与阿斯利康合作增强乳腺癌的 gBRCA 检测Owkin 是第一个使用尖端因果人工智能来解锁精准药物发现、开发和诊断的端到端人工智能生物技术公司，很高兴地宣布与全球生物制药公司阿斯利康建立新的合作伙伴关系，共同开发人工智能驱动的药物直接从数字化病理切片中预筛查乳腺癌中 gBRCA 突变 (gBRCAm) 的工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Owkin-partners-with-AstraZeneca-to-enhance-gBRCA-testing-for-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Owkin-partners-with-AstraZeneca-to-enhance-gBRCA-testing-for-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=210b4e12-ebb6-4b27-bdd3-6c6ade2069e6 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 07:35:00 -0400
Myogenes 氯氮平测试有望改善精神分裂症患者的治疗结果Myogenes 是基因检测领域的领先创新者，已获得英国创新机构 Innovate UK 的资助，以进一步开发其革命性的 Myogenes 氯氮平测试，用于治疗难治性精神分裂症 (TRS)。这种尖端的基因分析工具有望显着改善患者护理并为 NHS 节省大量成本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Myogenes-Clozapine-Test-promises-to-improve-outcomes-for-schizophrenia-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Myogenes-Clozapine-Test-promises-to-improve-outcomes-for-schizophrenia-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6651b85-3b06-4b31-8f21-d20c5d687a7b Fri, 04 Oct 2024 07:34:00 -0400
Monmouth Scientific 将在实验室创新展上展示可持续清洁空气解决方案英国清洁空气解决方案的领导者 Monmouth Scientific 将参加今年的实验室创新展，分享对推动实验室环境可持续发展的创新技术的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Monmouth-Scientific-to-showcase-sustainable-clean-air-solutions-at-Lab-Innovations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Monmouth-Scientific-to-showcase-sustainable-clean-air-solutions-at-Lab-Innovations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b15b907e-2ce9-45de-a04b-51494c97d75e Fri, 04 Oct 2024 06:38:00 -0400 Monmouth Scientific to showcase sustainable clean air solutions at Lab Innovations
研究显示道路和飞机噪音与心房颤动风险升高有关研究结果表明，交通噪音暴露与心房颤动有关，凸显了环境因素在心血管健康中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Road-and-aircraft-noise-linked-to-elevated-atrial-fibrillation-risk-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Road-and-aircraft-noise-linked-to-elevated-atrial-fibrillation-risk-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5bd72e53-892f-4309-a304-aedec4e1a774 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 05:24:00 -0400 Road and aircraft noise linked to elevated atrial fibrillation risk, study reveals
中风仍然是全球死亡的主要原因，其风险增加与生活方式因素有关《柳叶刀》神经病学研究提供了对中风负担和风险的最新估计，强调在高风险地区采取有针对性的干预措施的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Stroke-remains-a-leading-cause-of-death-globally-with-increased-risk-linked-to-lifestyle-factors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Stroke-remains-a-leading-cause-of-death-globally-with-increased-risk-linked-to-lifestyle-factors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=405be0a9-15ac-4ea9-8596-e2dfbde07ac2 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 04:57:00 -0400 Stroke remains a leading cause of death globally, with increased risk linked to lifestyle factors
